welcome.title: Welcome to Genesis!
welcome.description: Genesis is the dApp for HZN holders. If you’ve never used Genesis before, read through our quick introduction first.

whatIsHorizon.title: What is Horizon?
whatIsHorizon.description: Horizon is a decentralized synthetic asset issuance protocol built on Binance Smart Chain.  These synthetic assets (zAssets) are created by staking the Horizon Network Token (HZN), and these zAssets can be exchanged for each other directly with the upcoming Horizon DEX.

whyStakeSnx.title: Why stake HZN?
whyStakeSnx.description: HZN stakers receive two kinds of rewards. Firstly, they receive HZN staking rewards, which are created through the inflationary monetary policy. Secondly, there’s the zAsset exchange rewards, which are generated by zAsset trades on the upcoming Horizon DEX.

howStakeSnx.title: What do HZN stakers need to do?
howStakeSnx.description: All zAssets need to be backed by staked HZN at a Collateralization Ratio of 750%.  HZN stakers need to manage their own ratio to be above this figure, which they can do by burning zAssets to increase their ratio or minting hAsssets to reduce it. If they do this, they can collect weekly rewards.

risks.title: What are the risks?
risks.description: All HZN stakers create a ‘debt’ when they stake.  Their debt begins as the amount of zUSD they initially mint, and fluctuates according to gains or losses made by other zAsset holders.  Any time anyone holds a zAsset that appreciates in value, that gain is distributed proportionally between the staked HZN holders’ debts. A staker must pay off their debt before they can unlock their staked HZN.

walletConnection.title: Please connect a wallet with your HZN holdings to start:

success.title: Select Wallet
success.subtitle: Please select the wallet you would like to use with Genesis

loading.connectInstructions: Please follow the prompts on your device to unlock your wallet.

intro.title: What would you like to do?

action.title: Mint
action.subtitle: Mint zUSD by staking your HZN. This gives you a Collateralization Ratio and a debt, allowing you to earn staking rewards.

action.title: Burn
action.subtitle: Burn zUSD to unlock your staked HZN. This increases your Collateralization Ratio and reduces your debt, allowing you to transfer your HZN.

action.title: Claim
action.subtitle: If you have staked your HZN and minted zUSD, you are eligible to collect HZN Staking rewards.
action.note: Note: if not collected within 7 days, your rewards will be forfeited and rolled over into the fee pool.

action.title: Track
action.subtitle: Track your debt over time, with charts via

action.title: Trade
action.subtitle: Trade your zAssets for zUSD. For the full dApp, which allows you to trade between any zAssets, use Horizon Dex.

action.title: Transfer
action.subtitle: Transfer your ETH, HZN or zAssets.

intro.title: Available for sale:
intro.subtitle: Deposit zUSD into a queue to be sold for ETH. You can withdraw your zUSD at any time while waiting. Note: minimum deposit is 50 zUSD.

staking.title: Vest your HZN staking rewards in escrow
staking.subtitle: If you have staked your HZN and minted zUSD, you are eligible to receive HZN staking rewards, which you can vest here after they have been escrowed for 12 months.

tokenSale.title: Vest your escrowed HZN from the token sale
tokenSale.subtitle: If your HZN is still escrowed from the token sale, you can vest it here.

locked.subtitle: First approve the Unipool contract to transfer your sETH UNI-V1 tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your UNI-V1 Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens, claim HZN rewards, or exit completely.

locked.subtitle: First approve the Unipool contract to transfer your sXAU UNI-V2 tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your UNI-V2 Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens, claim HZN rewards, or exit completely.

locked.subtitle: First approve the iEthRewards contract to transfer your iETH zAssets for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your iETH zAssets, claim HZN rewards, or exit completely.
unlocked.settle-info: You need to settle before being able to stake your iETH.

locked.subtitle: First approve the iBtcRewards contract to transfer your iBTC zAssets for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your iBTC zAssets, claim HZN rewards, or exit completely.
unlocked.settle-info: You need to settle before being able to stake your iBTC.

curvepool.title: Curve Finance zUSD LP Token Rewards

locked.subtitle: First approve the Curvepool contract to transfer your Curve LP tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your Curve LP tokens, claim HZN rewards, or exit completely.

curvepoolSBTC.title: Curve Tokenised BTC LP Token Rewards

locked.subtitle: First approve the Curvepool contract to transfer your Curve LP tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your Curve LP tokens, claim BPT rewards, or exit completely.

locked.subtitle: First approve the Balancer Pool contract to transfer your BPT tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your Balancer (BPT) tokens, claim HZN rewards, or exit completely.

popup.title: Delegate wallet addresses
popup.description: Delegation enables a wallet to execute functions on behalf of another wallet: mint, burn, claim, and exchange, but not transfer.

input.label: Enter new wallet address to delegate:

transactionSettings.title: Set gas price
transactionSettings.subtitle: Adjust the gas price (GWEI) below to set the transaction speed.

confirmation.title: Please confirm transaction
confirmation.subtitle: To continue, follow the prompts on your <1>walletType</1> Wallet.

complete.subtitle: Your transaction has been broadcast to the Binance smart chain. You may close this window as the transaction will complete in the background.

curve.heading: Earn rewards with your zUSD at Curve
curve.description: Deposit your zUSD to receive CRV and HZN rewards

error.notEnoughToMint: You cannot currently mint that much zUSD
error.notEnoughToBurn: You do not have that much zUSD to burn.

maintenance.title: Genesis is currently unavailable due to upgrades.
maintenance.subtitle: Sorry for the inconvenience, it will be back shortly.

mobileLanding.title: Genesis is currently unavailable for mobile and tablet.
mobileLanding.subtitle: We hope to have a mobile version available in the next few months.

tooltip.claim: To claim rewards, you must be within 1% of the Target Collateralization Ratio. If you are below this figure, you will be blocked from claiming rewards until you burn enough zUSD.
tooltip.debtBalance: Your debt begins as the amount of zUSD you initially mint, and fluctuates according to gains or losses made by other zAsset holders. Any time someone holds a zAsset that appreciates in value, that gain is distributed proportionally between all the staked HZN holders’ debts. To unlock all your staked HZN, you must first pay off your debt.
tooltip.synthsBalance: zAssets are the synthetic assets in the Horizon system, including zUSD, sBTC, iBTC, and all of the other assets available at exchange. This figure is the total value of all the zAssets held in this wallet. If you wish to convert some zAssets back into zUSD, click the TRADE button.
tooltip.track: <0>Issued debt:</0> This displays the total of all your mints and burns over time, revealing how only your C-Ratio management has affected your debt.<1 /><2>Actual debt:</2> This displays your total debt over time.
tooltip.poolCompleted: This incentive is now completed. Please collect any rewards accrued and withdraw your tokens.
tooltip.liquidation: This is the ratio at which your HZN can be liquidated. Liquidation was added in SIP-15, and once your C-Ratio goes below the liquidation ratio there is currently a {{liquidationDelay}} hours delay period before you can be liquidated.
